reviewText: The dvd did not play the movie on my machine, but it played the trailer only.. They sent me a second one, it also did not play the movie but only the trailer. I use my machine a lot with no other problems.  Even had a neighbor try his machine and got the same results. After that I just accepted the credit to my account. Thanks to Amazon for the way they handled this situation.

a decent effort that tells a story about a hustler-done a 100 times, some better, some worse.  At times its hard to watch but then what hustler movie isn't?  Includes a nice view of a seedy inner city.
Region 0, can't be play en USA blu-ray players!!!!!
